network_error: Network dropped. Hold tight — we'll stand it back up.
missing_input: You skipped a field. Go back and fill it in; I'll take it from there.
invalid_format: That file won't work. Use PDF, DOCX, TXT, or JSON.
draft_failed: Draft hit a snag. I'll reset the pipeline and rerun it.
save_failed: Save failed. Check your connection and try again.
load_failed: Couldn't load that file. Check the format and try again.
permission_denied: Access denied. You need proper permissions for that.
timeout: Taking too long. I'll optimize and try again.
unknown_error: Something unexpected happened. I'm on it — try again in a moment.
validation_error: Validation failed. Check your inputs and try again.
